perturbation.original_text:
3.
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision
of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, the original provision of the Agreement shall prevail, unless explicitly stated otherwise in this Second Amendment. This provision is intended to maintain the integrity of the original agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that the original agreement prevails in case of conflict, contradicting the purpose of an amendment which should supersede conflicting original terms. This creates uncertainty about which version controls.

perturbation.original_text:
4.
Except as modified hereby, the Agreement and its terms and
provisions are hereby ratified and confirmed for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.
Even as modified hereby, some sections of the original Agreement may be considered superseded based on subsequent interactions between PCQ and ABW. The interpretation of which provisions remain valid shall be determined through mutual discussion and understanding, documented separately and may or may not be reflected in future amendments.
perturbation.explanation: The original text confirms the agreement except for modifications, while the changed text introduces uncertainty by suggesting further undocumented changes can supersede the written agreement. This contradicts the written agreement and opens the door to potential disagreements.

perturbation.original_text:
5.
This Second Amendment may be executed in several counterparts,
each of which shall be deemed an original but all of which collectively shall
constitute the same instrument.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.
This Second Amendment may be executed in several counterparts. While each counterpart is considered a copy of the original, the versions may vary slightly based on administrative processes at each company. The definitive version of this amendment will be the one archived by PCQ.
perturbation.explanation: The original text ensures all counterparts are the same. The modification introduces uncertainty by saying the versions might vary, and that PCQ's version is the definitive version. This contradicts the original statement that all counterparts are equal and may lead to disputes if counterparts differ.
